item.title: 个人简介
item.description: Xingjie Shi (史兴杰), Associate Professor Academy of Statistics and Interdisciplinary Sciences East China Normal University ISI Elected member 现场统计研究会环境与资源统计学会理事 研究方向：组学遗传学数据融合、高维大数据统计计算 Email: shixingjie0615@gmail.com div.blue { background-color:#E3AF63;

item.title: Publications
item.description: Liu, Wei; Liao, Xu; Yang, Yi; Lin, Huazhen; Yeong, Joe; Zhou, Xiang\(^\ast\); Shi, Xingjie\(^\ast\); Jin Liu\(^\ast\): Joint dimension reduction and clustering analysis of single-cell RNA-seq and spatial transcriptomics data, \(\underline{Nucleic \space Acids \space Research}\), 2022, gkac219, R Package Zhang, Xiao; Liu, Xu; Shi, Xingjie\(^\ast\); Model Selection for Varying Coefficient Nonparametric Transformation Model, \(\underline{Econometric \space Journal}\), accepted, R Package Yang, Yi\(^\#\); Shi, Xingjie\(^\#\); Zhou, Qiuzhong; Sun, Lei; Yeong, Joe\(^\ast\); Liu, Jin\(^\ast\);
